text:
In honor of North West's fourth birthday today, Kim Kardashian shared an adorable compilation of home videos with her daughter on her website.

The montage includes sweet mother and daughter moments from the reality star's Snapchat. Kardashian wrote a message to the 4-year-old on her website along with the video, "HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO MY MINI ME! I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU ARE 4 ALREADY. I LOVE YOU SO MUCH, NORTHIE!"

"Even when you're big, you're going to be so nice to me?" Kim asks North in the video. "Yeah," the birthday girl adorably promises.

The duo is known for mastering mother-daughter style, from slip dresses and chokers to flashy eveningwear. At Kanye West's concert back in September, the two wore matching silver Vetements sequin dresses.

Getty Images

We wouldn't be surprised if Nori's birthday outfit topped this, though.

Kim also posted an adorable Instagram of her looking admirably at North. "My baby girl turned 4 years old today! She's my light & my everything!!! I love you to the moon & back North," said Kardashian.

Happy 4th birthday, North West!
title: Kim Kardashian Shares an Adorable Home Video For North West's Birthday
